external_games.name: Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths

name: Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths
storyline: In "Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths," players join Bubbly, a robotic lure, on a mission to explore the ocean's depths and combat pollution. Bubbly teams up with Splash, a seahorse friend, to face challenges, clean up plastic waste, and battle the formidable Plastic Leviathan. As they navigate vibrant coral reefs and murky depths, they uncover secrets and work to restore the ocean's beauty, all while inspiring real-world environmental action.
summary: Join Bubbly on an epic journey through the depths of the ocean in "Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths"! As a guardian of the sea, navigate through stunning underwater worlds and combat pollution in a quest to save marine life. Share your results on social media directly from the game.
